amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities and Villages; Laws Applicable to All
amendatorysection.catchline: Law enforcement; joint institute; trainees; costs and expenses.
amendatorysection.para: Any city or village, in the State of Nebraska, is hereby authorized and empowered to pay from municipal funds the cost of training and the expenses of trainees, designated by its governing body, to attend the law enforcement institute jointly sponsored by the Police Officers Association of Nebraska and the Extension Division of the University of Nebraska and held periodically at the University of Nebraska at Lincoln, Nebraska.
